Home.subtitle2: Specialized in Front-End Angular, Next.js, Figma
Home.profile_image_alt: Person with glasses and black t-shirt, web developer

description.p1: I’m Francisco Coya, a web developer specialized in front-end with experience on real-world projects for public institutions. I’m studying Software Engineering at the University of Oviedo and have worked as a freelancer developing modern, optimized applications.
description.p2: I’m passionate about building accessible, clean, user-centered interfaces. I work with frameworks such as Angular, Next.js and React, applying best practices in performance optimization, usability and accessibility (WCAG 2.1 AA). I also have solid back-end knowledge with Node.js and Spring Boot, CI/CD and software design.
description.p3: In my free time I enjoy photography, design and music. Creativity and technology are the pillars I bring into all my projects.
